sqlMap.insert: insert into comm_board_replies (reply_no, user_no, board_no, reply_content) values (replies_seq.nextval, #user.no#, #board.no#, #content#)
sqlMap.select: select A.reply_no as no, A.user_no as "user.no", B.user_name as "user.name", A.reply_content as content, A.reply_deleted as deleted, A.reply_created_date as createdDate from comm_board_replies A, comm_users B where A.board_no=#value# and A.user_no = B.user_no order by A.reply_no asc
